c74object:
Take snapshot of an mc signal and output it as a list
Similar to snapshot~ or mc.snapshot~, but it outputs the values as a list. It is the external object equivalent of the bl.mc.snapshot~ abstraction, except that it has a built-in change filter.
Balint Laczko bl audio mc utility
The multichannel (or single channel) signal to snapshot
The snapshot of the multichannel signal as a list
​
​
Enable periodic output
The rate of the list output. Default is 100 ms.
Enable internal change filter
When set the object will only output a list when the incoming signal has changed.
​
